title: 怎么我装材质包就出错呢~！
author: sizkuk
txt_content:
高清修复也搞了，然后把材质包也放在texturepacks文件夹里面了

然后进游戏选材质包后就出现这个错误提示，我复制出来了求高手指导下！


      Minecraft has crashed!      
      ----------------------      

Minecraft has stopped running because it encountered a problem; Rendering screen

A full error report has been saved to E:\我的世界\Minecraft_1.5.1\.minecraft\crash-reports\crash-2013-04-08_14.08.57-client.txt - Please include a copy of that file (Not this screen!) if you report this crash to anyone; without it, they will not be able to help fix the crash :(

replies.author: sizkuk
replies.txt_content: 我找到问题了，，我电脑竟然只能用64X的。。。我靠。。什么情况
